text: "I Bet You Look Good on the Dancefloor" is a 2005 debut single by Arctic Monkeys and is the leading single from their debut studio album Whatever People Say I Am, That's What I'm Not. It went to number 1 in the United Kingdom and Scotland, number 12 in Ireland, number 14 in New Zealand, number 18 in Australia and number 15 in Denmark. ==Track listings== ==References== Category:2005 songs Category:Debut singles Category:Arctic Monkeys songs Category:Garage rock songs Category:Indie rock songs Category:Punk rock songs
title: I Bet You Look Good on the Dancefloor
